roleset.name: to settle

example.name: passive
example.text: [The former congressman , who *T*-2] resigned as speaker of the House after an investigation of his financial dealings , is ensconced [*] in his district office , maintained [*] by taxpayers on a $ 200,000 [*U*] allowance .

his district office , maintained [*] by taxpayers on a $ 200,000 [*U*] allowance
